lead_paragraph: The Nittany Lions held off a last-ditch effort by the Tigers to win a thrilling and muddy Capital One Bowl, 19-17.
snippet: The Nittany Lions held off a last-ditch effort by the Tigers to win a thrilling and muddy Capital One Bowl, 19-17.

headline.main: Penn State Gets Dirty to Beat Louisiana State
headline.seo: Penn State Gets Dirty to Beat Louisiana State in Capital One Bowl
headline.print_headline: Penn State Gets Dirty To Beat Louisiana State
